file_content.text: Blizz like new friend ship! Much better than Slam's old one.
Blizz join new friend crew to thank new friend for getting Blizz out of blue-man cage.
Behave yourself and pull your weight, and you can stay.
I have no problem with that.
Glad to have you, little guy. Make yourself at home.
Welcome aboard.
Blizz promise to not take up much room.
Saving your skin better be worth my trouble.
Good, 'cause you owe me.
Blizz be big help, you see!
There goes the peace and quiet.
Oh, hush. We're all glad to have you along, Blizz.
We're glad to have you along, Blizz.
I'll second that.
Finally, I can't wait to get the feeling in my fingers back.
Looks like the Chiss sent the payout. Wow... you think we'll rake in this much on all our jobs now?
Your credit transfer just came in. I guess the Chiss did want Vause pretty bad.
You think we'll rake in this much on all our jobs now?
The Blacklist ones anyway.
Seems likely.
This keeps up, we might just retire with all our parts intact.
I really hope so.
It won't last nearly as long as you think.
Retire? Was just getting started.
If all our marks are as bad as Vause, we ought to.
We better.
If all else fails, use a little extort--er, "strong" negotiation.
Well, if we're done here, I'm going to take a nice long shower.
Take Blizz with you. I don't think he's familiar with the concept.
Someone's calling to congratulate you. I can't miss this.
Well, so much for hazing. We're the only ones looking foolish.
An unprecedented success.
I'll admit it. You're good.
Now that you're up to your ears in credits, you'll need an excuse to spend them.
Let's hear your offer, Bloodworthy.
I'm listening.
You just took down the two hardest targets on the Blacklist, back to back.
If that isn't cause for celebration, I don't know what is. So we're throwing you a party.
My wish list's already ten parsecs long.
Who needs an excuse?
Don't tell me you're broke again already.
Mine too, but you need to take a little time for yourself now and again.
Spill it, or get off my comm.
Just make your pitch.
We decided all this success of yours is cause for celebration. So we're throwing you a party.
We've procured a penthouse suite for the occasion. The best spot on the Promenade, I'm told.
I like your style. Not enough women worth respecting in this business.
Still aren't.
What was that?
Nothing.... Should we take them up on it?
You'd better show.
Who could resist an invitation like that?
Come on, big guy. You never show me a good time.
It has been all work and no play.
You're right, you deserve it.
You're the best!
Oh, I'll show you a good time, all right.
I'll add my personal touch.
Um, public.
You gonna dress for the occasion?
Will you actually doll up?
If you actually buy me something, I'll wear it. Jerk.
Are you two finished?
Sounds fun. Come on, we could use a little break.
There's nothing else on our plate right now.
All right. Let's go.
Be sure to charge everything to the room.
Hey, it's not our money.
Try not to go overboard. You're the one who's been making bank these days.
The room's already booked on Nar Shaddaa; you can meet us there.
I'm not spending my off-hours with these losers.
Forget it.
Don't make us drag you here kicking and screaming. The room's already booked.
Haul your tail to Nar Shaddaa; we'll meet you there. Don't keep us waiting.
